…
Here are just a few projects I’ve worked on over the past year. Each post contains a finalized R Markdown document. Code can be made visible within each document by selecting a section labeled ‘Code’.

articles.title: Projects
articles.contents:
Some projects I’m currently working on include:
A knitted hat for my mother
A jello mold incorporating imitation crab, miso, and seaweed
A pinata of undetermined form, to be embellished with rhinestones
